verified_facts.fact: package.json is missing bcrypt, express-session, csurf, express-rate-limit, body-parser — all required by server.js
verified_facts.method: Read package.json directly + grep server.js for require statements

verified_facts.fact: Auth routes (/api/auth/*) are not mounted in server.js despite being implemented
verified_facts.method: grep for authRoutes in server.js returned no matches

verified_facts.fact: brandRoutes.js has zero authentication middleware — all 10 endpoints are public
verified_facts.method: grep for requireAdmin/authenticateAdmin in brandRoutes.js returned no matches

verified_facts.fact: aiDiscovery.js admin endpoints have no auth middleware
verified_facts.method: grep for requireAdmin/authenticateAdmin in aiDiscovery.js returned no matches

verified_facts.fact: Client-side coupon codes SAVE10, 10OFF, WELCOME20 are hardcoded in cart-custom.html line 529
verified_facts.method: grep for coupon codes in cart-custom.html confirmed exact line numbers

verified_facts.fact: course-module has only course-config.js — no backend routes, no schema, no API
verified_facts.method: feature_audit verified against file system; confirmed by gap_analyzer

verified_facts.fact: Two email service files exist: email-service.js (379 lines) and emailService.js (978 lines)
verified_facts.method: Confirmed by gap_analyzer analysis of service files

verified_facts_round2.fact: checkout.js uses client-supplied price directly in Stripe session (no server-side catalog lookup)
courseRoutes.js requireEnrollment uses email-only auth (no session check) — trivial bypass via ?email= param
verified_facts_round2.method: security_audit confirmed line 121; review_audit confirmed courseRoutes.js was freshly implemented in task 015

verified_facts_round2.fact: brandRoutes.js and server.js both construct file paths from unsanitized brandId param
verified_facts_round2.method: security_audit confirmed both at lines 13 and 329 respectively

verified_facts_round2.fact: auth.js line 23 has DEFAULT_ADMIN_HASH = bcrypt hash of admin123 as fallback
downloadRoutes.js uses custom Basic Auth with plaintext comparison and 'use-admin-dashboard' default
TENEO_CLIENT_SECRET production OAuth secret committed to .env.example line 96 with comment calling it the actual production secret
verified_facts_round2.method: security_audit confirmed with code snippet showing the secret value

verified_facts_round2.fact: All 19 original tasks (001-019) are status: completed — confirmed by review_audit (100% verification score, 37/37 tests pass)
verified_facts_round2.method: review_audit_output.json verified 12 tasks, conductor_output.json confirmed all 19

rejected_findings.finding: download.js HIGH — in-memory token store lost on server restart
rejected_findings.reason: download.js is NOT mounted in server.js (only downloadRoutes.js is). The in-memory Map is dead code. Risk is zero in production. Reclassified as P3 dead-code removal.

false_positive_patterns.pattern: Audit says 'service was cut off during analysis' or 'suggesting'
false_positive_patterns.lesson: This indicates uncertain analysis, not a confirmed bug. Verify before accepting as task.
false_positive_patterns.example: Lulu integration gap — gap_analyzer said 'may be incomplete' due to analysis cutoff, not a confirmed bug
